ValidationRule.description: Take Offline Date should be mandatory when the closing reason is 'Take Offline' for Internal case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Yogiyo_Internal_Case', TEXT(Type) = 'Take Offline', TEXT(Closed_Reason__c) = 'Take Offline', ISBLANK( Take_Offline_Date__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the 'Take Offline Date' before closing the case
